Trade/Device Name(s): Nova Stat Profile Prime CCS Analyzer System
Stat Profile Prime Auto QC Cartridge CCS
Stat Profile Prime Ampuled Control ABG/CCS
Stat Profile Prime Calibrator Cartridge CCS/CCS Comp
Regulation Name(s): Blood gases (PCO2, PO2) and blood pH test system
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Nova Stat Profile Prime CCS Analyzer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Nova Stat Profile Prime CCS Analyzer System and associated calibrators, controls, and standards for blood gas, electrolyte, metabolite, and CO-oximetry analysis from whole blood samples.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic use by healthcare professionals in clinical laboratory settings for the quantitative determination of pH, PCO2, PO2, hematocrit, sodium, potassium, chloride, ionized calcium, and glucose in heparinized whole blood for the diagnosis and treatment of acid-base disturbances, anemia, electrolyte and metabolic disorders, parathyroid disease, and carbohydrate metabolism abnormalities.
